name: Arhena the Amazon
overview: Help Arhena, Queen of the Amazons and/or her sister Arika complete their quest in search for the fountain of youth. Armed with a shield, and swords. You must fight against the evil tribes men and monsters that lurk through the jungle and their caves. You must then meet your final match against an evil demon - who obviously guards the fountain of youth. Can Arhena and/or Arika succeed with their quest for immortality. Or will they be enslaved by the demon forever?
